Subject: Re: Energon hunt
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

He new Autofire would respond this way, as a Mercenary, he had worked for
the Autobots, a move that outraged galvatron, but Galvatron did little to
remedy this, but Megatron was desperate. "Even when I rule, there will
always be someone who steps up with heroic nonsense, and the people who are
ruled have to be kept under our heel. It would be more interesting". This
robot was dangerous, Megatron noted, he would have to watch out for him. "I
am here to rebuild what Galvatron destroyed, and as far as I know, I am the
only Decepticon left. What do you want? Just a promise of payment for your
services".
